sentences.cn: 铱系统与AMPS系统之比较 ( 续 )

sentences.en: An anion exchange preconcentration - neutron activation analysis procedure is developed to determine ( iridium ) in seawater.
sentences.cn: 研究了用阴离子交换预富集中子活化法测定海水中 铱 的分析方法.

sentences.en: Analyzing the fossils at this small site, they counted 52 distinct species just below the iridium layer.
sentences.cn: 他们分析了这个小地区的化石层，一共计算了在铱层下面的52个不同物种。

sentences.en: Before the collision , Iridium had a group of sixty - six satellites in orbit.
sentences.cn: 在这些卫星陨落之前, 铱星 公司有66颗卫星在轨道上运行.

sentences.en: Comets consist of " dirty ice ", rather than solid rock, and so contain little iridium.
sentences.cn: 彗星是由 “ 脏冰 ” 所组成, 而不是像小型那样由固体岩石组成, 所以只含有少量的铱.

sentences.en: Here are some pens with gold or iridium nibs.
How long will Iridium spark plugs last?
sentences.cn: 铱金火花塞寿命是多长 呢 ?

sentences.en: In a laboratory vault outside Paris is a small cylinder of platinum–iridium alloy that serves as the standard for all mass measurements worldwide.
sentences.cn: 在巴黎郊外的一个实验室地下室中，有一个铂铱合金作的圆筒，这个圆筒就是作为世界上所有质量测量的标准。

sentences.en: Iridium satellites are unusual because their orbit is so low and they move so fast.
sentences.cn: 铱卫星通常轨道较低,其运动较快.

sentences.en: Iridium: Metallic chemical element, one of the transition elements, chemical symbol Ir, atomic number 77.
sentences.cn: 铱: 金属化学元素, 为过渡元素的一种, 化学符号Ir, 原子序数77.

sentences.en: Iron, nickel, copper, silver, gold, iridium , or ruthenium may be included as cocatalyst metals.
sentences.cn: 铁 、 镍 、 铜, 银 、 金, 铱或钌,可用作复合催化剂金属.

sentences.en: Music is divided into three kinds, with playing music, percussion, and Wu iridium.
sentences.cn: 乐曲分为三种, 有吹奏乐 、 打击乐和武铱.

sentences.en: Study on the Pulsed Laser Deposited Process , Structure - controlling and Properties of Iridium Oxide Thin Films.
sentences.cn: 银氧化锡复合材料的制备及性能研究.

sentences.en: The results of thermal decomposition confirmed that it is iridium films by XRD.
sentences.cn: 热分解沉积薄膜经X射线分析确为铱薄膜.

sentences.en: They're also seeking a cheaper catalyst than iridium.
sentences.cn: 同时他们也在寻找比铱更便宜的催化剂.

sentences.en: This story, though, raises the question of why there is but a single ejecta layer of iridium and shocked quartz in late Cretaceous rocks around the world.
sentences.cn: 不过，这一假设提出了个问题，在全球各地白垩纪晚期岩石中，只有单独的一层铱和冲击石英，这是为什么？

sentences.en: Using the same approach, iridium is alloyed with rhodium.
sentences.cn: 使用同样方法, 铱被熔合与铑.

trans.tran_en: a hard and very heavy metal that is combined with  platinum  to make jewellery and is used in scientific instruments. It is a chemical  element  : symbol Ir
